NPC.name: elf warrior
NPC.description: The shapely green skinned humanoid is alert and wary in this dangerous environment. Her eyes roving, her body clad in a crude armoured jacket of wooden slats over cloth. The armed and pointy eared warrior looks ready for trouble, one hand resting on her knife hilt as she keeps a wary eye out.
